query:
UPDATE leads SET status = CASE
  WHEN status = 'New' THEN 'New Lead'
  WHEN status = 'Contacted' THEN 'Contact Made'
  WHEN status = 'Interested' THEN 'Intro Scheduled'
  WHEN status = 'Not Interested' THEN 'Lost/Winback'
  WHEN status = 'Converted' THEN 'Enrolled'
  ELSE status
END;
